description: A Dynamizer is an object that injects timeseries data for an individual attribute of the city object in which it is included. The timeseries data overrides the static value of the referenced city object attribute in order to represent dynamic (time-dependent) variations of its value.

properties.name: attributeRef
properties.description: Specifies the attribute of a feature whose value is overridden or replaced by the (dynamic) values specified by the Dynamizer.

properties.name: startTime
properties.description: Specifies the beginning of the time span for which the Dynamizer provides dynamic values.

properties.name: endTime
properties.description: Specifies the end of the time span for which the Dynamizer provides dynamic values.

properties.name: sensorConnection
properties.description: Relates to the sensor API that delivers timeseries data.
